p: Maoto is often prescribed for influenza. Maoto was shown to act as an antipyretic in children [ 5] and to be more effective than oseltamivir in children younger than 5 years of age [ 6]. Maoto has also been reported to inhibit virus replication in cultured cells [ 7]. However, reports on the effects of other Kampo drugs on virus replication in vitro are limited.
